short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show badge notifications in the taskbar when using Gmail as an app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Setup:

1. Install the extension
2. Add Gmail as an app. You can do so by following this guide: https://support.google.com/chrome_webstore/answer/3060053?hl=en - make sure to select the option "open as a window".
3. Open the newly installed app.

Usage instructions (including custom settings):
https://github.com/aberonni/gmail-app-badge-notification?tab=readme-ov-file#usage

Troubleshooting:
https://github.com/aberonni/gmail-app-badge-notification#Troubleshooting

Reporting issues:
https://github.com/aberonni/gmail-app-badge-notification/issues
